modName: UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul addon- follower protection
summary: UFO version 1f with protected or not protected followers. You choose!
descriptionHtml:
***Sorry if I still haven\'t updated this to 1g version. The reason is I\'m developping something
more.... complex ;) 

UFO from flokii version 1f with unprotected followers 

AREN\'T YOU TIRED OF HANGING WITH HALF GODS??
Aren\'t you bored that even after removing the \"essential protection\",
there is still many others \"semi essential protection\"?! Things thatl\'ll make survive your
followers against any attack?!

This protected status meaning these NPCs/followers can die, but ONLY at your hands; 
I mean if you let em in the middle of 200 archmages; he ll eventually finish by escape..

You must already have the ultimate follower overhaul, if not
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14037
Follow their instructions first.

-then via your followers dialog menu \"you know\"
Activate & Deactivate protected status for any followers 
except guards/mercs.

At last your companions will live and die as everyone!
This is a tiny update so nothing should be different from UFO as I use only vanilla features

All credits goes to the creators of UFO!

Install wtih NMM then replace your ufo.esp
author: flokii lobnico

files.name: UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul 1f addon - unprotected followers
